labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The channel has to be manually cleared by clicking on "Mark as Read"
data.expected_result: Messages should automatically clear when scrolling to the last message of a channel
data.short_description: Reading / scrolling to the bottom of a channel no longer automatically clears the channel as "read"
data.steps_to_repro: - on a MAC - with the latest version of Chrome causes this to occur
